title: My 2 ideas of skins
body:
Well I was racking my head the other day when I was versing a trundle and I then thought of a pretty cool skin idea I thought of a tropical one I thought of that would look cool in game this one is called bantrop trundle/My other skin design is a Zed skin well anyway I called it the super undercover zed thank you for listing to this message and add me in game if u want me to show u

{{champion:48}} {{cha
